definitions.text: a plaything consisting of a Y-shaped stick with elastic between the arms; used to propel small stones
a device that launches aircraft from a warship
an engine that provided medieval artillery used during sieges; a heavy war engine for hurling large stones and other missiles
shoot forth or launch, as if from a catapult
examples: the enemy catapulted rocks towards the fort

definitions.text: hurl as if with a sling
